name: Wax and Wane Christmas Ornaments
description:
What's not to love about the moon, really? These ornaments are made from hand-cut and hammered aluminum, given a brushed-bright finish and topped off with a bit of golden silk for hanging on your tree (or slipped in a stocking or..). 


Aluminum, silk. 
1" diameter.

options.name: Set of 3: Two Crescent, One Full
Set of 3: Two Full, One Crescent
Set of Six: Three Crescent, Three Full

name: Lunar Hoops
description:
These earrings feature modern moon shapes in rustic metal. A hand-hammered and patinated finish give this copper an interesting edge. 


Sterling silver earwires; copper components. 
Small: 3/4" diameter; Large: 1" diameter

name: Open Water Earrings
description:
Simple and swingy, lightweight and eye-catching - these earrings really are pretty perfect. The copper color and hand-hammered and patinated surface add a rustic feel while the bold shapes keep them looking modern. 


The details:
---------

Sterling silver earwires; copper components. 
3/4" diameter.

name: Souvenir Bracelet
description:
This bangle bracelet reminds me of the simple something you pick up from a local shop while on vacation to remind you of the place after you've returned home. It's made from thick, sturdy brass stock and sweetened up with a forged-flat panel along the top. I've given this panel a green patina, which contrasts just beautifully with the gloss and tone of the metal. The open bracelet ends are hammered into a gentle angle to hug the wrist. Plays well with others but is a standout solo, too.


Made from: brass, patina
Dimensions: 2.25" in diameter, adjustable
Notes: While the patina is meant to be permanent, and is water-resistant, please avoid wearing in water or where it might otherwise be exposed to chemicals that could affect the patina

name: Double Bauble Stacking Ring
description:
I've brought back one of my first ring designs with a few new touches! Handcrafted from start to finish here in my Ohio studio, I've given these a rustic feel via lightly hammered edges and an oxidized finish. Made for stacking with each other or other rings in my collection (or yours), these rings each have a simple and striking silhouette when worn alone, too. 

Each one has been tumble-polished for a slight gloss and for durability - these babies were made to last.

name: Aequus Necklace
description:
Two moons in complimentary sizes, one brass, one silver, swing from oxidized sterling silver chain. Sweet and serene and a little bit edgy - a great signature jewelry piece for any wardrobe. 

Sterling silver, reclaimed brass.
Larger moon is 1" in size. 
18" sterling silver chain. 
Brushed finish.

name: Aromatic Cedar Points - Set of Three
description:
I love the smell of cedar. I made these points one by one, without a pattern, hand sanding them to a velvety smooth finish. Each one is one of a kind, and wonderfully aromatic. Created to mimic the shape of a crystal point, these beautiful pieces are made to be displayed. Of course, you can also tuck them into drawers or slip them into put-away winter coat pockets to repel moths, too. 

Three cedar points.
Approximately 2.5" long by .75" square.

name: Lune Earrings
description:
Look how dainty - these asymmetrical earrings measure just under half an inch in diameter! Each is a moon shape - one a full moon, one waxing (or perhaps waning). Subtly different from each other and hung from simple sterling earwires, these are an easy go-to pair. 


Sterling silver; repurposed brass.
 Approximately 1/2" in diameter.

name: Imprint Necklace
description:
I love this simple necklace. To me, it's reminiscent of a thumbprint, with texture created by my best-loved hammer, and a slightly concave shape. I've hand cut, sanded, and polished this pendant to a high gloss and strung it with a simple bronze ring onto oxidized silver chain. Eye-catching worn alone; plays well with others.


Sterling silver; bronze.
Chain is 18" in length.
Pendant is approx. 3/4" in length.

name: Vintage Wooden Japanese Bowls
description:
I love these bowls. I love their simple shape, I love their color, I love them all stacked up like this. (Don't worry, I'm keeping a few from my collection for myself!) I keep mine on hand to hold snacks (nuts and such!) when I have parties, or to hold small simple objects, like stones or shells.

Vintage from Japan, these footed bowls are made from blonde wood. Two options are available: those with a slightly flared edge, and those without. 

*Please not that, since these are vintage, they have some normal wear, as shown. I do not and will not ever sell items that have cracks, chips, or stains.

name: Amande Earrings
description:
Lovely and lightweight almond-shaped hoop earrings in handformed and forged brass. Hinged in the middle, these earrings are full of movement. The open design is striking but not overwhelming, lending these a simple, modern feel.

Available in brass (shown) or sterling silver (not pictured).
Both metal options have sterling silver earwires.
2.5 inches in length.

name: Double Pyramid Earrings
description:
Sometimes I get a shape in my mind, and I can't stop thinking about it until I've made it into a piece of jewelry. When I got this shape in my head, I sat down and sawed out enough 18 pieces, large and small. I would have kept going, but I got hungry. :)

These earrings are brass, made from found brass sheet, with the original, beautiful patina kept intact. Earwires are sterling silver. 

2.25" in length.

name: Modern Hamsa Necklace
description:
This pendant was a labor of love, coming straight out of a terribly sad week. I wanted (and needed) to make something beautiful. Each piece was cut from sterling silver, then filed, smooth, stamped, patinated (this is what darkens the chain and makes the details pop), and polished. It hangs 1.75" in length from sterling chain (you choose the length). The ring finger features a wash of pure 24 karat gold, which has been permanently fused to the metal. (NOW AVAILABLE in sterling silver and brass, too!)

I wanted this piece to be:

like henna, 
like tiny tattoos, 
like those palmistry diagrams, 
like a hamsa, 
like a child's drawing.

It came out just as I hoped it would. I was careful to make sure it did. I can't wait to continue this series. I want to set gems in the palms and rivets at the fingertips. I want to personalize it for each person who wants it. I want to make the pinkies in solid gold. For now, it comes as shown in the photos: with X's, O's, hearts, and lines.

Please do contact me if you'd like to personalize this with your own preferred letters, symbols, or numbers.

Read more about my process for this piece here: 
http://oworld.typepad.com/my_weblog/2012/08/open-hands.html

name: Reusable Ring Sizer
description:
One handy dandy ring sizer that's infinitely (well, nearly, I imagine) reusable. Just slide the end through the loop and adjust to size. Easy!

Just $5, shipping is free, AND, upon buying, you'll receive a discount code good for $3 off any ring purchase you make within 30 days of buying the sizer.

name: Tiny Gem Personalized Plaque Necklace
description:
Sweet, simple, and striking - this Tiny Gem Plaque necklace is made from sterling that's handsawn, sanded and polished to order, without a pattern - no two are exactly alike! A wonderfully modern take on the monogram - perfect for mamas, bridesmaids, or your own sweet self.

These plaques measure in slightly larger than the Tiny Gem pendants - 1/2" instead of 1/4 - 3/8". 


HOW TO ORDER:

Select a chain length below. 

On the checkout page, in the 'Message' section, let me know what ONE stamped image you'd like, selected from the list below:

A-Z (capital letters)
a-z (lowercase letters)
0-9 (numbers)
& (ampersand symbol)
Arrow
Exclamation Point
Period
Question Mark
Heart
Leaf

name: Studio Stacking Rings
description:
I love making stacking rings. They are among the first pieces I made, and whenever I want to be reminded of how awesome it is to be able to make things out of metal, I come back to this simple shape.

One by one I form, solder, hammer, and polish these rings to a gorgeous gloss. I don't get to make them often, so get them while you can! This listing is for ONE Studio Stack Ring of my choice, selected from a variety of styles, most shown above - thick or thinner, twisted or 'plain', with various hammered styles, either oxidized or in bright sterling silver. These rings are lovely worn alone, and priced to wear in multiples!

Price is for ONE ring.
Randomly selected!
Shipping is FREE - everywhere!

name: Abilene Nose Ring
description:
One diminutive sterling blossom adorns this nose screw, soldered to an 18 gauge post and brushed bright. 


Blossom is a distinctive but very wearable 5mm in size.
Avail. in a screw or L shape.

Body jewelry gauges differ. Check with your piercer to find out your gauge!

name: Frida Earrings
description:
One of my most popular styles 5 years running!

 Flared brass stampings with a hand-patinated surface anchor swinging, vinatge pod beads in glossy red. The patina is hand-painted, layer by layer, with each application allowed to dry in between, for a durable, permanent verdigris finish. I love the contrast of gloss and matte finish in these earrings.

Sterling earwires.
2.25 inches in length.

name: Tiny Gem Personalized Pendant Necklace
description:
My best selling necklace for 3 years running!

I think these lovelies are just perfect for gift giving to just about anyone from bridesmaids to mamas to boyfriends to besties - or your own sweet self.

Each sterling silver pendant is hand sawn - without a pattern, so each one is one of a kind - and given softly beveled edges, then stamped with a letter, number, or symbol. Oxidized for beautiful contrast, hung from lightweight, slinky chain, these pendants are perfect for everyday wear, and look wonderful layered with other necklaces.


Sterling silver.
Pendants are approx. 8mm in size and come attached to the chain with a 4mm sterling jump ring.

--------

HOW TO ORDER:

Select a chain length below. On the checkout page, in the 'Message' section, let me know what ONE stamped image you'd like, selected from the list below: 

A-Z (capital letters)
a-z (lowercase letters)
0-9 (numbers)
& (ampersand symbol)
Arrow 
Exclamation Point
Period
Question Mark
Heart
Leaf

*Please allow 14 business days from date of purchase for personalized items to ship.

name: Hello, Ohio - Personalized CHOOSE YOUR OWN STATE Pendant Necklace
description:
Hello, Ohio - or Maine, or California, or Kansas, or New York (or anywhere else!).


Each state pendant is sawn by hand, sanded, oxidized, and buffed to a satiny sheen. Personalize the pendant if you wish - mine has a little 'B' stamped where my hometown would be - or leave it blank. A heart to mark your city is always a good choice! These necklaces are perfect as gifts for besties, boyfriends, bridesmaids - or your own sweet self.

All necklaces have sterling silver chains, with pendants made from either sterling silver or reclaimed brass. Necklace is 18" in total length. Available in sizes SMALL (just under 3/4") and LARGE (just shy of 1"), in brass or silver. 

---------------------------------

HOW TO ORDER:

Select a size and metal preference below. On the Paypal checkout page, in the 'Message' section, let me know what state (ALL 50 states are available!) and ONE stamped image you'd like.

Personalizations available are:

A-Z (capital letters)
a-z (lowercase letters)
0-9 (numbers)
& (ampersand symbol)
Arrow 
Exclamation Point
Period
Question Mark
Heart
Leaf
$ (dollar sign)

*Don't worry if you forget to enter this information in on your Paypal checkout page - just send me an email with the information!


PLEASE ORDER BY 12/16 for Christmas delivery!
˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚˚
